Execution of system commands commonly us.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for command execution containing 'mount' or related keywords (Note: This log source is primarily for Windows hosts and unlikely to capture Linux mount execution directly unless specific cross-platform logging is configured). Correlate with Zeek conn.log for preceding network connections to the host where the command might have been executed.

Anomalous network traffic to/from a host.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for unusual session lengths, traffic volume, or destination ports involving hosts suspected of using bind mounts for evasion. Use statistical analysis (e.g., time series analysis, outlier detection) on network traffic metadata to identify anomalous communication patterns.
